sentence: More  than  11,000  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  fighting  began  Oct.  7,  mostly  civilians,  according  to  the  Health  Ministry  in  Gaza.
Most  of  the  1,200  dead  in  Israel  from  the  Oct.  7  Hamas  attack  were  also  civilians,  according  to  Israeli  officials.
Civilians  get  killed  and  the  whole  world  puts  pressure  on  Israel,"  said  Sharvit  Baruch,  now  with  the  Institute  for  National  Security  Studies  in  Tel  Aviv.
Palestinians  said  several  hundreds  were  killed  and  blamed  an  Israeli  airstrike.
Hamas  denied  this,  while  hospital  officials  said  bystanders  accounted  for  many  of  the  13  killed  and  dozens  injured.
